interface.name: ipsec_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute ipsec in the ipsec domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: ipsec_stream_connect
interface.summary: Connect to IPSEC using a unix domain stream socket.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: ipsec_getattr_key_sockets
interface.summary: Get the attributes of an IPSEC key socket.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: ipsec_exec_mgmt
interface.summary: Execute the IPSEC management program in the caller domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: ipsec_manage_pid
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the IPSEC pid files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: ipsec_domtrans_racoon
interface.summary: Execute racoon in the racoon domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: ipsec_domtrans_setkey
interface.summary: Execute setkey in the setkey domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: ipsec_run_setkey
interface.summary: Execute setkey and allow the specified role the domains.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the racoon and setkey domains.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the racoon and setkey domains to use.
